Uses of Enum Class
com.irurueta.numerical.robust.RobustEstimatorMethod

Packages that use RobustEstimatorMethod
Package
Description
com.irurueta.numerical.polynomials.estimators
 
com.irurueta.numerical.robust
This package contains robust estimators that can be used to discard outliers for cases where a model of the data is known (i.e. estimating lines, planes or many other geometric objects, etc.)

  • Uses of RobustEstimatorMethod in com.irurueta.numerical.polynomials.estimators
